nodes.title: Lower hospital bills for plans & patients | Goodbill
nodes.markdown:
# Never overpay for hospital visits again.
Ensure plans and members pay only what’s fair, with 501(r) discounts and pre-payment claim reviews.   
  
**Capture 8% average savings on annual plan spend.**
[See plan solutions](https://www.goodbill.com/#501)[Book a demo](https://www.goodbill.com/demo)
Got a hospital bill?
[We help you negotiate, too](https://www.goodbill.com/patients)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612e9f045f2221976e23951c/6604329937592fb0dabd3821_Arrow%20Right.svg)

Capture 8% average savings on annual plan spend.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612e9f045f2221976e23951c/65fdada01b4c91bdb17a0850_hp-hero.png)

# We're building trust and confidence into every healthcare transaction.
At Goodbill, we're on a mission to make healthcare billing transparent, trustworthy and affordable.   
‍  
We’re backed by the same investors who helped build some of the most iconic companies of our time, like Glassdoor, GoFundMe, Groupo

NEWSOptimyl Partners With Goodbill To Tackle Hospital CostsOptimyl is bringing a smarter way to save on hospital claims for its self- and level-funded clients.Read now
NEWSTall Tree TPA Brings On Goodbill to Control CostsBy partnering with Goodbill, Tall Tree is helping its groups control one of the biggest drivers of healthcare costs.Read now
NEWSClearwater TPA Taps Goodbill for Hospital SavingsClearwater members now get access to Goodbill’s full suite of hospital savings services.Read now
NEWSAtlas.md EMR Embeds Goodbill for DPC DoctorsAtlas.md doctors can now guide patients to hospitals that offer 501(r) discounts of up to 100% off.Read now
NEWSConcierge TPA Adopts Goodbill for Self-Funded ClientsThe third-party administrator of self- and level-funded plans now offers Goodbill to clients.Read now
NEWSGoodbill Wins TIME's Best Inventions AwardGoodbill is among the 2023 winners, which capture the 200 best innovations around the world.Read now
CUSTOMER STORIESA $7K Hospital Bill for a Tweaked Back, and on the Hook for All of ItTheir hospital told them there was "no such thing as negotiating," but they got their bill lowered by 20%.Read now
CUSTOMER STORIESFlorida Vacation Goes South After Overnight Hospital Stay Costs $50KWhen an overnight ER visit cost her nearly $50K, a Florida patient turned to Goodbill for help.Read now
INSIGHTSWhere TPAs Crave Innovation: Better Contracting, Smarter SteerageTPAs reveal where they want innovation, what’s driving costs, and what frustrates them most.Read now
INSIGHTSWhy This Season Feels DifferentAs midyear renewals heat up and January planning ramps, benefits advisors are seeing changes.Read now
INSIGHTS2 Efficient Strategies to Reduce Your Health Plan SpendLearn about how 501(r) discounts and EHR-enhanced claim reviews can help you capture savings.Read now
INSIGHTSHow to Negotiate Hospital Bills: 5 Things I Didn't Know BeforeCEO Patrick Haig shares 5 insider tips he learned from negotiating hundreds of hospital bills.Read now
INSIGHTSER Visit Cost for Heart Palpitations: Most Expensive HospitalsFind out which hospitals and states charge the most for treating heart palpitations.Read now
GUIDEHow to Negotiate Your Hospital BillRead our expert tips on how to negotiate hospital bills and save money.Read now
GUIDECan Hospital Bills Affect My Credit?Y‍ou have more time than you think before your hospital bill can go to collections or affect your credit.Read now
GUIDEItemized Bill: Your Key to NegotiatingItemized bills provide key details that can help you negotiate your hospital bill.Read now
GUIDEWhy Did My ER Visit Cost So Much?Here are 5 things you need to know about ER visit costs, and how to tell if your bill is correct.Read now

GUIDEYour Right of Access to Records You’re legally entitled to get your billing and medical records from your hospital, under HIPAA law. Read now
